title: Distributed Ledger without a Native Digital Token.Other
description: Distributed Ledger without a Native Digital Token exists solely to support registration and identifier assignment of auxiliary digital token

DTIType.description: Distributed Ledger without a Native Digital Token
DTIType.title: Digital Token Identifier Type
DTIType.elaboration: Category of the digital token identifier

enum_titles: Distributed Ledger without a Native Digital Token
Functionally Fungible Group of Digital Tokens

DLTType.title: Distributed Ledger Technology Type
DLTType.elaboration: Category of systems implementing distributed ledger technology based on their consensus mechanisms

enum_elaboration.1: Blockchain Distributed Ledger with confirmed blocks organized in an append-only, sequential chain using cryptographic links
enum_elaboration.0: Distributed Ledger which is not based on blockchain

templateVersion.title: Template Version
templateVersion.description: The template version (i.e. JSON schema document) for which this record is valid

LongName.condition: Conditionally required for non provisional records
LongName.description: Refers to the long name of the distributed ledger
LongName.title: Digital Token Long Name
LongName.elaboration: Digital token long name is a string containing the full name of the digital token

OrigLangLongName.description: Refers to the original language long name of the distributed ledger
OrigLangLongName.title: Original Language Digital Token Long Name

URL.description: Refers to the reference implementation of the distributed ledger
URL.title: Digital token reference implementation URL
URL.elaboration: Uniform Resource Locator (URL) pointing to the digital token’s reference implementation or software repository

PublicDistributedLedgerIndication.condition: Conditionally required for non provisional records
PublicDistributedLedgerIndication.title: Public Distributed Ledger Indication
PublicDistributedLedgerIndication.description: If true, access to reading the distributed ledger is unrestricted and the data elements are accessible for independent verification by the general public

recVersion.title: Record Version
recVersion.description: The version of the record, incremental integer starting at 1 and incrementing each time the record is updated (e.g. with a new fork)

recDateTime.title: Record Date Time
recDateTime.description: The time at which this record version has been created

Provisional.title: Provisional Digital Token Identifier
Provisional.description: If true, the record contains normative or informative data elements in a provisional request for a DTI when one or more data elements (which may include mandatory data elements) are not yet available

Private.title: Private Digital Token
Private.description: If true, the record contains normative or informative data elements that are verified according to the DTIF guidelines but may not be independently verifiable by the general public

Disputed.title: Disputed Digital Token Identifier
Disputed.description: If true, the record contains normative or informative data elements that are disputed by one or more DTIF users

Deleted.title: Deleted Digital Token Identifier
Deleted.description: Record is marked Deleted due to technical reason(s) (e.g. invalid or duplicate token) or due to business reason(s) (e.g. a provisional token becomes invalid). Users are advised not to use this token.
